subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Afeter a long discussion...
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Frank, if you're still reading, I consider this to be YOUR group.  It's 
about YOUR research.

We all know the long hours you have put in unselfishly experimenting with 
the box.  If you leave, I will unsubscribe. There would be no reason for 
me to be here.  I could care less what Chris Moon has to say.  He hasn't 
even approached what you've done. Nor do I think he ever will.

So please take a couple days off, go for some long walks, and reconsider. 
You have friends here.

Zack


On Wed, 12 Dec 2007, Frank Sumption wrote:

>
> After a long discussion, and at times a yelling match with Chris Moon on the phone...I have like zero memory for verbal stuff, basically I think it came down to he said-she said type deal. I could agree with some of what Mr Moon said, but the bottom line is--I don't care! I have had enough of these endless pissing contests, one person telling me one thing, someone else telling me something else. I'm not wise enough to tell who is telling the truth. I'm done, I'm not discussing this stuff anymore, I'm not making boxes anymore. I have absolutely no interest in the so called paranormal. I don't sell this shit, I don't make any money, all it does eat all my time and piss me off. I'll finish this last box I'm working on, and that's it. No more e-mails, no more discussion--I have had it!
>
> Mr Moon said he would be glad to come on the group and answer question--so there ya go, now is your chance. I'm not going to be the go between, nor will I participate.
>
> Frank-S
>
